attributes.action: make the sharing of government money more fair
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Personal and family circumstance means that many people recieve money from the government, for example EMA (Education Maintenance Allowance) and university support grants, that do not really need it and others that do need it do not. The critera need to be rethought when deciding peoples eligibilty. After all, just beacause someones parents earn alot doesn't mean they get any of it!
